title: Liverpool
name: Wolstenholme Creative Space
directions: between Duke Street, Slater Street, Hannover Street & Seel Street. Look for the balls.
content: Wolstenholme is an artist run gallery and studio space situated within a beautiful listed ex textile factory in the heart of Liverpool city centre. Info can be found on the website or just by dropping by, you may be fortunate enough to stumble upon some impromptu happening.
